name: ZAOinvest
slogan: African Diaspora Impact Investing Platform. Make Money For A Purpose. Start from $50
description:
We envision a world where finance plays a central role in solving the social challenges facing the global community.
In this future, investors create an impact helping build a sustainable future for all people.

At ZAO, we are building  African Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) Impact Financing Infrastructure.  

Our vision is to get out of  financial exclusion 1 Million individuals and SMEs in Sub Sahara Africa by 2030. We know this is a Big Hairy Audacious Goal, and we Walk the Talk to make it happen.
Our mission is to develop and market deep tech. digital mobile first investment and data management products, initially in the broader AgriTech and Renewable Energy industries, to unlock universal access to credit. 

We are involving the African's Diaspora to effectively leverage patient capital in profitable and impactful projects ‘back home’ where it is needed most.

Our team is made up of seasoned impact finance and high tech. experts from a variety of backgrounds and disciplines

team.name: Vincent Alcouffe
team.bioHtml: T-Shaped-Intrapreneur | E-MBA | MSc EE | Strong Wireless and IoT background |  Want to join an early stage start up and have loads of hard work fun there!

jobs.title: CTO Co-Founder
jobs.description:
Who we are: 

ZAOinvest is an early stage online impact investing platform that allows the African diaspora to effectively leverage their patient capital in profitable and impactful projects ‘back home’ where it is needed most. 

Our mission and day-to-day work is to mesh both finance and deep tech, develop and market digital data-centric tool box solutions, to unlock access to credit.

We envision to get out of financial exclusion 1 Million individuals and SMEs by 2030.

We are seeing a growing need for sustainable social investments into Africa’s SMEs. We are already addressing this demand for capital, and we are on a path to go much further:  build an ecosystem of partners, later embed both artificial intelligence & data science for credit scoring differentiation purposes. We won't stop there: however, while thinking big, we start small.

Who we are looking for:

We are looking to find a CTO Co-founder. 

The role is ideal for an ambitious, intelligent and entrepreneurial individual looking to make a mark in the world by using both web and deep-technology to drive social impact in Africa.

We are looking for someone who:
1- can build and lead a team in building our MVP to market as well as driving the technical strategy for ZAOinvest,
2- is not just a technical wiz but also a problem solver and a strategic thinker,
3- is passionate about changing the world. One feature at a time,
4- work hard, play hard, put ego out and put customers/users first.
5- Realise that we win when we collaborate — and that everyone misses out when we don’t 

Remote work is possible so long based in Europe. Will also consider candidate based in East Africa eg Kenya. 
We promote diversity.
